articles.title: Sony Xperia 1 VI is here - SD 8 Gen 3, better zoom and more conventional screen - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The Xperia 1 VI ditched what it didn't need and made the rest better. Coming in June for €1,399. The Sony Xperia 1 VI is official and it's looking like a...
articles.content:
The Sony Xperia 1 VI is official and it's looking like a welcome refinement of the Xperia 1 V formula.
The biggest change is the move away from the staple 4K OLED in its cinema 21:9 aspect ratio and… [+2924 chars]
